DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test novel distance-based ( telephone ) intervention help transplant candidate current recent substance abuse stay `` clean sober '' prior follow transplant surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants need liver renal transplant ineligible due current recent ( past 6 month ) alcohol and/or drug abuse recruit transplant program St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center ( renal ) , Columbia Presbyterian Hospital ( renal/liver ) Virginia Commonwealth University Medical Center ( liver ) . Baseline follow-up computer-assisted assessment structure clinical interview along collection biological sample ( urine , hair ) occur transplant clinic ; however , phone counseling session originate St. Luke 's . Participants randomly assign one two treatment : ( 1 ) usual care ( phone counseling ) ( 2 ) usual care + counseling . The telephone counseling session design help participant become motivated remain abstinent improve health behavior sleep stress management .
DOC.criteria: End stage liver renal disease Having use drug alcohol past 6 month Turned transplant due current recent substance use Access telephone Psychotic unstable serious psychiatric disorder preclude full , active participation Moderate severe hepatic encephalopathy NonEnglish speaking
